title: Auto-rotate daily quotes in Today's Inspiration section

requirements.summary: Update Dashboard's Today's Inspiration section to fetch daily quote from backend using date-based query, replacing hardcoded quote with automatic daily rotation
acceptanceCriteria: The Today's Inspiration section on the Dashboard displays the quote returned by the backend's daily-quote query.
Visiting the Dashboard on different calendar days shows different quotes.
No quote is hardcoded in the frontend source.
Existing pastel brown text styling and transparent background of the section are preserved.

file_operations.description: Replace the hardcoded inspirational quote in the Today's Inspiration section with a dynamic fetch using the useGetDailyQuote hook from useQueries.ts. Calculate the current day-of-year and pass it to the backend query. Display the returned quote while preserving the existing pastel-brown text color and transparent background styling. Ensure the section handles loading and error states gracefully.

Add a new React Query hook useGetDailyQuote that accepts dayOfYear as a parameter and calls actor.getDailyQuote(dayOfYear). Configure the query to cache by dayOfYear so different dates fetch independently. Include proper enabled/retry configuration consistent with other query hooks in this file.
